I agree completly. JP has no respect. Why would anyone fake their death to =
get out of a game? And even if it were for more serious problems, wouldn't =
they just quit and change thier e-mail? That would be so much easier than h=
aving a bunch of people who you really don't know belive you died.

JP you =
are a sick person. I do hope that there is help for you. And If this gets u=
s kicked out of the game, well, I guess you got your way. Ohh, and if It do=
es, my characters will go to people besides you. I pity you, I really do. A=
nd that's a rare thing with me.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rob=
ert Dahl 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001=
 9:22 PM
  Subject: Re: Suicide King


  I am not gonna make this private b=
ecause I have something I have to get off
  my chest. JP, what is your majo=
r malfunction?  Why can't you be courteous?
  If this gets me kicked out of=
 the game, so be it. You are a sadistic bully.
  I've really enjoyed playin=
g this game, except for when it comes to dealing
  with you. Playing with p=
eople like Roborick and Yanshosh, and reading posts
  by Kinger and Airly i=
s enjoyable. But you are a waist of my time. Why would
  he do this to get =
out of a game, instead of just saying "I Quit" Even if it
  is a trick (whi=
ch I dont believe it is, because I have more faith in
  people) isnt it saf=
er to just be polite? Just from reading your posts, I
  knew you would do s=
ome kind of sick twisted thing like this. I feel for
  you, because you obv=
iously dont have any redeeming qualities. Go ahead and
  insult me back, wi=
th your elementary bashing, and crude post. Nothing you
  say matters, caus=
e everyone on this chat is levels above you when it comes
  to dealing with=
 people. Go see a psychiatrist, because you are a royaly
  screwed up perso=
n. Get a life. Sorry everybody, but I have no patience for
  discusting scu=
m.
